text: Hey everyone, I am developing a web app that will host my server less functions for a public HubSpot app. I’m going to use it to authenticate the public app but I want to get it to where people can login to my web app and see that it’s connected to their HubSpot account, is the possible? I think Associ8 does this?

Hello, I am building a blog listing and a blog post page but I struggle with this template. my template is made out of modules but I use a module multiple times. But when I fill the content I can only fill 1 of these modules. the other just get filled with the first value's. How can I fix thix?

Also blog_posts still dont allow drag and drop right?
